title: Maganese
desc:
Post 1238
*To be honest i thought this was another word for Magnesium*
- At any time you may turn this card into 366 **Magnesium**
- At any time you may turn this card into 1210 **Iron**
- Pretend to be as usfull as iron. When this card is played it is shown as iron, but the effect will not activate. Someone may attempt to identify this card. if they identify it correctly, they discard a card, if it is incorrect, they draw 3 cards. Only one person may guess once.
